triples.name: Lyapunov function
triples.relevance: The paper uses Lyapunov functional methods for proving stability of the proposed time-varying formation control system.

triples.name: Particle swarm optimization
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel robust TVF controller optimization scheme combined with the PSO algorithm for improving formation performance.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the time-varying formation control problem for nonlinear multiagent systems with multiple interacting intelligent agents.

triples.name: Lipschitz continuity
triples.relevance: The paper extends control methodology to one-sided Lipschitz nonlinear systems, a more general class than standard Lipschitz continuous systems.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: The paper develops a robust control methodology for nonlinear multiagent systems to address the time-varying formation control problem.

triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The paper validates the proposed control approach through simulation of an autonomous aerial vehicle swarm system (AAVSS) composed of six AAVs.
